text: @realDonaldTrump Why did you give GAVI money are you out of your freaking mind? I won't vote for anyone who votes for forced vaccines. Wasn't Robert Kadlec run out for being a liar but you brought him back? and on 020420 he secretly gave Gates immunity for coronavirus in America. Is this China?
